selection_reasoning: Carry forward Gen18’s top three performers for exploitation, include a distinct shake-and-polish method for diversity, and keep the historical best as an anchor for refinement and seeding.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best of Gen18 (2.628939); basin-hopping + local L-BFGS-B + LP shows strong performance and stochastic diversity.
Second-best Gen18 (2.625284); budget multi-start penalized L-BFGS-B + LP is robust and scalable for further exploitation.
Third-best Gen18 (2.606733); annealed neighbor-weighted penalty variant with clear headroom via weight tuning and more starts.
Distinct shake-and-polish cycle with LP finalization; adds methodological diversity while remaining competitive (2.574547).
Historical best (2.635919); strong anchor to refine and to seed/benchmark future hybrids.
